summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AgriAdvisor AI - PWA-based agricultural decision support system for Maharashtra farmers. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend fully functional with excellent multilingual support and responsive design.

minor_issues.issue: Specific crop name 'Cotton' selector timeout during testing, but recommendations load successfully

passed_tests: Backend API - Soil analysis with Maharashtra coordinates
Backend API - Crop recommendations with Gemini AI
Backend API - Disease detection with image upload
Frontend - Page loading and header components
Frontend - Soil analysis integration and results display
Frontend - Weather forecast integration and data display
Frontend - Disease detection UI and file upload
Integration - Frontend to backend API calls
Integration - Real-time data display from APIs
AI Integration - Gemini Pro for crop recommendations
AI Integration - Image analysis for disease detection
action_item_for_E1: No critical issues found. The application is working excellently. Minor suggestion: Consider adding data-testid attributes to crop recommendation items for more robust testing, but this is not blocking functionality.

mocked_apis_confirmed: Market data is properly mocked with realistic Maharashtra crop prices
Satellite soil data uses mock values when Bhuvan API not available
Weather has fallback to mock data when OpenWeather API not available
additional_notes.ai_integration_status: Gemini Pro AI integration working correctly for both crop recommendations and disease detection
additional_notes.maharashtra_focus: Application properly handles Maharashtra coordinates and provides region-specific agricultural advice
additional_notes.pwa_features: Mobile-first responsive design implemented correctly, navigation accessible on all screen sizes
